summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with an enemy. The character, wielding a glowing staff or weapon, is positioned on a wooden bridge and appears to be attacking an enemy ahead, who has a health bar above them. The environment is a rocky, forested area with trees and foliage surrounding the scene. On the right side of the image, another figure in yellow clothing is seated on a rock, observing the encounter. Various icons and a health bar are visible on the screen, indicating gameplay elements such as abilities or items.
